summary: This collection of documents relates to William M. Kent's employment with the CIA, including his initial recruitment, security clearances, reassignments, and eventual retirement.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents details various aspects of William M. Kent's career within the CIA from 1951 to 1978. It includes records related to his recruitment, initial security vetting, requests to cancel active duty orders, interview reports, security clearance requests, notifications of personnel actions such as reassignments and pay adjustments, and finally, his involuntary retirement in 1978. The documents also reveal Kent's non-official cover status and assignments within the DDO.
title: Personnel File: William M. Kent
recipient: CHIEF, CONTROL DIVISION, OP; CHIEF, CONTRACT PERSONNEL DIVISION, OP; CHIEF, PCS/CSS
